body.name: Cinch Mop - Microfiber Mop for Hardwood Floors - Flat Mops System for Wood, Tile, Laminate, Vinyl, 2 Wet Pads Refills, Reusable Micro Fiber Mopping Heads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 56 mins
features: ✔️【 CLEANS DEEP and QUICK 】Our Microfiber Mop makes quick work of cleaning your hard floor surfaces. Quickly and effectively clean large areas. Our mop covers a wide area with each glide, so you'll use less effort and get your floors cleaner. Designed to effectively pick up dirt, dust, pet hairs, crumbs and other stubborn debris. Great for absorbing water and spills, leaving your floors streak free and spotless!

✔️【 ERGONOMIC & EASY 】Our strong but lightweight flat mop will be as easy on your floors as it is on your back! No more lugging around a heavy mop and bucket. Of course this makes quick work of dirty floors, but its lightweight and swivel lock also make washing walls easy! Of course this makes quick work of dirty floors, but our flat mop is so lightweight that it also makes dusting walls and ceilings easier than ever.

✔️【 GLIDES SMOOTHLY 】With its 360 degree swivel mop head, you get the best of both worlds, a huge cleaning surface that also easily maneuvers around hard to reach areas and makes quick work of cleaning under furniture, closets, bathrooms and any tight corners - effortlessly mop and clean messes in every direction. Makes mopping the floor a Cinch!

✔️【 EASY INSTALL 】The mop pads easily attaches with strong thick, fixed velcro along the mop pad, keeping it secure all all times. The microfiber mop heads are machine washable so you can reusable for 100s of floor cleanings. Simply toss the mop pads in the washing machine and it refreshes to new each time.

✔️【 ORDER TODAY for EASY CLEAN FLOORS 】We've made the perfect economical and easy to use microfiber mop floor cleaning system. You'll get cleaner, gleaming floors in no time! Perfect for hardwood, laminates, tile, concrete, stone and any hard surfaces, Order yours today!
body.description: Make Mopping A CINCH! Clean your floors with just water Our Cinch Mop is made to make mopping fast and easy! You don't need a bucket and you don't need any chemical cleaners. Just dampen the mop pads in the sink, wring them out, stick them onto the frame, and you are ready to go. When the pads get dirty just rinse, wring, and repeat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Make Mopping A CINCH! Clean your floors with just water Our Cinch Mop is made to make mopping fast and easy! You don't need a bucket and you don't need any chemical cleaners. Just dampen the mop pads in the sink, wring them out, stick them onto the frame, and you are ready to go. When the pads get dirty just rinse, wring, and repeat. Comes With 17" Microfiber Wet Mop Pads (2) 51" Handle 16" Angled Mop Frame Instruction Booklet

Mopping Made Fast and Easy! No More Heavy Mops Stop dragging your mop! This lightweight microfiber mop is user-friendly and easily maneuvers across your floors. With a full 360° swivel, a lightweight aluminum handle, and an angled frame and pads to get into corners, this mop makes cleaning your floors so much easier! Get Your Floors Streak Free With Just Water! High-quality microfiber cleans great with just water, and these are high quality! We've been in the microfiber business for quite some time, so we know what it takes to make a great mop pad. Of course, you can use these with your favorite cleaner and they'll work great too. Reusable Pads Made to last hundreds of washings without losing their ability to clean! You'll be using these to clean your floors for years to come. You can also handwash these because they are super easy to rinse and wring out.

Cleans Walls Too!! Swivel Lock Takes The Hassle Out Of Cleaning Walls When you want to clean walls, you don't want the mop frame to move all over the place. Most Microfiber Mop frames swivel a full 360°, which is great for maneuvering around objects, but not so great for cleaning or washing down your walls. So we added a swivel lock to our frame to keep the mop in place! Now you can clean walls and ceilings hassle-free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mop is great. Also, always good to have spares.
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Very happy with the ease of use and the results after mopping my fake wood floor (LVP). I just submerged the pad into hot water and a bit of Pine Sol, squeeze out the excess and drop it on the floor where the mop, when aligned properly with the pad, grabs the pad and off you go. The biggest problem I have is in the alignment of the mop with the pad. Takes a couple seconds to get them aligned but then the pad is firmly stuck to the mop. Floors look great afterwards. Mopping is now a breeze for me. I am a male in my 70s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the easiest way to mop my vinyl floors with a little vinegar and water, throw the pad in the sink or washer and save to expense of products! Neat handle and a large surface for my office or the house kitchen! Thanks for a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing, hard to find quality
reviews.reviewText: I am so very impressed by the materials and construction. Made in Illinois, USA, this tool will outlast the big box competition's offerings by many years. Great for hard to reach places where other mops fail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Swivel at base of handle is too loose
reviews.reviewText: I'm reviewing this for floors only, since that's what I'm using it for. Fortunately, there are instructions when assembling (fairly straightforward assembly), and most important, how to lock the swivel. There is a bottom ring just above the mop-head that limits the swivel from uncontrolled movement of the mop-head. You just turn a plastic ring a quarter turn to lock the swivel. That is where it will stay for my use,. There is also still some play, even after 'locked', and tightening the hex nut at the end of the handle with wrenches, but it won't affect floor cleaning. The pads are velcro-attached which is nice/convenient. They appear to be of quality pads. They are advertised to be easy to clean. The handle could be longer, or an extra 'extension' piece provided for an extra foot or so in length. For a 5ft 7 in person using the mop on floors, the length of the handle is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans my kitchen and bathroom fast and easy
reviews.reviewText: It’s quick and easy. You can’t put a whole ton of pressure since it’s connected in 3 areas so you’ll need more mop heads but the pads are super absorbent. Let the microfiber do the work not the pressure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far very pleased
reviews.reviewText: We have a short term rental so cleaning is at the top of our priority list for guests. Found this very affordable mopping system and have used it just once so far but really love it. I chose to spray the floor with my solution as I go. Worked super efficient with time saving for not having to dip my mop into the bucket, wring it out etc. Saving water too! It gets easily into corners and I don’t see that I’m ‘pushing’ debris into the corners like my last mop. For those who said the handle length was too short for them it does appear that you could add some sections to the handle. I’m short so it was perfectly comfortable for me. Highly unusual! All in all I’m a happy host who’s ready with super clean floors for my next guest!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Handle Too Short
reviews.reviewText: This was just delivered and it looks like a quality, sturdy mop I gave it it a little bit of a "dry run" right after I unpacked it. The description says, "extends to from 36” to 59” overall so even the tallest users can mop comfortably without bending over". Sadly, this is not so even at the full extension of the handle. I'm 6' tall and I found myself having to bend over more than I was comfortable with. We have over 1500 sq feet of vinyl plank flooring and any sort of bending gets painful in the amount of time it takes to mop that much floor. I had no choice but to return it, but I would certainly have kept it if the handle had been longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cleaning
reviews.reviewText: We had these before only in a different brand. They finally wore out so I went on Amazon to find the same thing. I found these & they are better than the old ones. The velcro is stronger to keep the pad on the holder. I use these to cling my sliding glass doors as I can't reach the top. Great for going over the floors too.

What can I say? I love this product. It's so very sturdy, easy to assemble, easy to use. I would buy it again and definitely recommend it. The two pads that come with it are very quick to attack and remove and the width makes cleaning my laminate flooring a breeze.
Works well on wood floors and ceramic and marble floors.

This mop is very easy to use and moves across the floor smoothly. My only problem with this mop is that the handle keeps coming unscrewed as I push it around. It's not just the one time. It has to be re-screwed after a couple of swipes across the floor. I would definitely give this mop 5 stars if the handle stayed together.
Great product! Cleans my floors with perfection

reviews.reviewTitle: Works exactly like it supposed too
reviews.reviewText: I had a cleaning device very similar to this for years and loved it. The velcro finally wore out so I decided to replace the whole unit. When I saw this one and all the good reviews it had, I took and chance and ordered it. It is nicer than my original one. Sturdy handle, durable velcro strips and the cleaning pads are a very good quality. My sister liked it so much she ordered one too. So far, we are very happy and feel we got a good product for the price.
